requirements.eligibility: 2nd/3rd year UG CS students graduating in 2026

intelligence.why_it_matters: Direct path to a Pre-Placement Interview for a full-time SWE role at Google.
intelligence.next_action: Perfect your LeetCode Mediums and update your resume for referrals.
intelligence.prep_tip: Focus heavily on Graph and Tree traversals for the phone screening stage.

requirements.eligibility: UG students from SAARC countries with high CGPA

intelligence.why_it_matters: One of India's most prestigious research internships; perfect for students aiming for MS/PhD or R&D roles.
intelligence.next_action: Submit a strong research proposal and get a recommendation letter from your HOD.
intelligence.prep_tip: Focus on your 'Statement of Purpose'; they value interest in specific research labs over just coding.

requirements.eligibility: Students from Top 30 Engineering Institutes in India

intelligence.why_it_matters: Gain experience in Telecom R&D with a government body; great for hardware-software integration profiles.
intelligence.next_action: Check if your college is in the top 30 list and apply through the official NATS portal.
intelligence.prep_tip: Review basics of Computer Networks and OSI layers; they often ask about communication protocols.

requirements.eligibility: Students subject to systemic bias in tech; Remote global

intelligence.why_it_matters: High-stipend remote internship with global open-source communities (GNOME, Linux, etc.).
intelligence.next_action: Complete the initial application before the Feb 13 deadline to enter the contribution period.
intelligence.prep_tip: Contribution is key. Start interacting with mentors early in the mailing lists or Slack/Zulip.

requirements.eligibility: Enrolled UG/PG students in Indian Institutes

intelligence.why_it_matters: The most prestigious Govt-linked hackathon in India; massive resume weight.
intelligence.next_action: Form a team of 6 and select a problem statement from the official portal.
intelligence.prep_tip: Learn to build a production-ready MVP; judges value scalability over UI.

requirements.eligibility: Open to all students interested in AI Automation

intelligence.why_it_matters: Hyper-focused on the hottest tech trend: AI Agents. Great for showing you are ahead of the curve.
intelligence.next_action: Study LangChain or CrewAI frameworks to build autonomous agents.
intelligence.prep_tip: Focus on multi-agent collaboration use cases like automated research or coding assistants.

intelligence.why_it_matters: Showcase your skills at a premier IIT technical fest; excellent for networking with IIT students.
intelligence.next_action: Check the Xpecto official site for problem statements released 48 hours early.
intelligence.prep_tip: IIT hackathons value unique approaches; don't just use standard templates.

requirements.eligibility: Any student interested in software building

intelligence.why_it_matters: Perfect for building consistent portfolio projects and gaining global community visibility.
intelligence.next_action: Register on MLH portal and join the Discord server for team matching.
intelligence.prep_tip: Focus on 'Learning' tracks—they provide excellent starter code.

requirements.eligibility: 1st/2nd year UG students with high academic standing

intelligence.why_it_matters: One of India's most massive private scholarships; provides an elite network of scholars and leaders.
intelligence.next_action: Prepare for the aptitude test which covers logical reasoning and quantitative math.
intelligence.prep_tip: They look for 'Future Leaders'—highlight any volunteer work or student club leadership.

requirements.eligibility: UG students in Engineering/Medical with annual family income < 6L

intelligence.why_it_matters: Direct financial aid for tuition fees; high success rate for students fromTier-2/3 cities.
intelligence.next_action: Gather your income tax returns and college fee receipts for the application.
intelligence.prep_tip: A well-written 'Financial Need' essay is crucial. Be honest about your family's situation.

requirements.eligibility: Students 18+ years old enrolled in college

intelligence.why_it_matters: The gold standard for Open Source; extreme value for remote-job seekers.
intelligence.next_action: Join IRC of organizations you admire and start fixing 'Good First Issues'.
intelligence.prep_tip: Start 4 months early. Selection is 90% about your relationship with the community.
